name: Fruit is One of my Favorite Foods Quiz  | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which of these fruits is yellow and must be peeled before you eat it?
questions.explanation:
Bananas.

	All of these fruits can be eaten with their skin on except the banana. You must peel off the yellow skin of a banana before you enjoy its yummy sweetness.

questions.text: Which of the following fruits is often used to make a sweet purple jelly?
questions.explanation:
Grapes.

	Grapes come in many colors, but grape jelly is almost always purple in color. Whole grapes are good to eat and grape juice is a nice drink with your lunch or afternoon snack.

questions.text: What color are oranges before they are ripe?
questions.explanation:
Green.

	Oranges, which are high in vitamin C, are green before they are ripe. There are many types and sizes of oranges and all make healthy additions to your diet.

questions.text: Which fruit, when it is dried, is known as a prune?
questions.explanation:
Plum.

	A dried plum is called a prune. Both are sweet and full of vitamins. Try them both ways.

questions.text: Which fruit comes in varieties known as Granny Smith and Red Delicious?
questions.explanation:
Apples.

	Granny Smith are tart green apples often used in baking pies. Red Delicious are large red apples that are sweet to eat right off the tree. There are many types of apples and most can be used in the production of apple juice.

questions.text: Which one of these fruits is usually not sweet?
questions.explanation:
Lemons.

	Lemons are a yellow citrus fruit that are usually tart and sour in taste. Add lemon juice to water and sugar and you will get the wonderful summertime treat known as lemonade. Like all citrus fruit, lemons are high in Vitamin C.

questions.text: Kiwifruit are large yellowish-orange fruit with a big seed in the middle.
questions.explanation:
False.

	This is false. The tasty kiwifruit has a fuzzy brown skin that covers a bright green flesh that has lots of tiny black seeds. The description provided matches that of the fruit known as a mango.

questions.text: What fruit is often used to make a popular dessert known as upside down cake?
questions.explanation:
Pineapple.

	The tropical fruit known as the pineapple is often used to make the yummy dessert known as pineapple upside down cake. Pineapples are high in the mineral known as manganese and helps with digestion.

questions.text: Which of the following fruits, when ripe, is brown on the outside and orange on the inside?
questions.explanation:
Cantaloupe.

	Cantaloupe is a sweet melon popular in many countries throughout the world. The ugly brown skin hides the nutritious orange flesh inside. While this melon can be used in cooking it is usually eaten raw.

questions.text: What fruit is often used to make a semi-solid sauce often served with Thanksgiving turkey?
questions.explanation:
Cranberries.

	Cranberry sauce is a popular side dish, often served with a Thanksgiving holiday turkey. They are a beautiful red color and are high in many important vitamins and minerals.
